pid.description: The standard PID controller for PiFire, used by default. This software was originally developed by GitHub user DBorello as part of his excellent PiSmoker project: https://github.com/DBorello/PiSmoker.  Slightly modified by @weberbox and adapted for PiFire.

config.option_description: Proportional Band(PB): This is the temperature band centered around the set point, that the controller is active.  If the error is greater than PB/2, the command is 0.  If the error is less than PB/2, the command is 1.0
Derivative Time (Td): Time (in seconds) to predict the future value.
Integral Time (Ti): Time (in seconds) to eliminate the integral error.
